MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA7 postcode area of Runcorn, affecting properties in Rutland Street, Ashridge Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.05am. Our engineers are on their way to investigate the caused of power loss and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.30am on 13th of March 2021
